Style/UnlessLogicalOperators.description:
Description

Checks for use of logical operators in an unless condition.
Style/UnlessLogicalOperators.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

EnforcedStyle: forbid_mixed_logical_operators (type: str)
SupportedStyles: ['forbid_mixed_logical_operators', 'forbid_logical_operators'] (type: list)
